h2.font: Welcome to South Pointe where our students- Dream, Believe and Grow!

div.font:
South Pointe Elementary School joined the South Pointe Learning Community in 2008. From day one, we have had the growth of our community in mind. Our first goal is providing a quality education while offering programs such as parent workshops, family food bank, after school tutoring programs and much more. Your child will succeed in our family-oriented environment that genuinely cares about the overall student.
​Here are some reasons why you should choose SPES:
